mapper.insert: insert into t_order(oidx, sbidx,uidx,sidx, point, uaddr) values( #{oidx}, #{sbidx},#{uidx},#{sidx}, #{point}, #{uaddr})
mapper.select: select COUNT( distinct oidx) from t_order
select * from t_order o, t_store_book sb WHERE o.sidx=#{sidx} AND sb.sbidx = o.sbidx and o.state=#{state} order by o.oidx limit #{start}, #{listsize}
mapper.update: update t_order set state=#{state}, ${datetype}=now() where oaidx=#{oaidx}
